text: Blabia masoni is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1927. It is known from Colombia.BioLib.cz - Blabia masoni. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Blabia Category:Beetles described in 1927
title: Blabia masoni
